original_text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses there in Moab beside the Jordan River. Jericho was on the other side of the river. The Lord said,
korean_text: 여리고 맞은편 요단 강 가 모압 평지에서 여호와께서 모세에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord spoke to Moses
there in Moab beside the Jordan River
Jericho was on the other side of the river
